alert.note: Alert for Marion; Nelson; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nelson, north central Marion and southwestern Washington Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bardstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Marion, southwestern Washington and central Nelson Counties, including the following locations... East Bardstown, Booker, Bearwallow, Maud, Botland, Mooresville, Polin, Withrow, Croakes and Balltown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
